post.body: maybe she's our next intern? it's a family affair! malcom is practically part time here, right @jordanguthmann?
i think it's an apple that doesn't fall far from the tree, not an acorn. either way: like father, like daughter. talented writer.
- we officially live in the wrong city. i give you @beerandblog
ironic that you're using Twitter to discuss the news
- I'd say hybrid, like @zappos. it allows the brand to have personality and fosters customer connection/engagement
shouldn't that be "note to self?" since you were on the party planning committe?
the cold going around my office that @jordanguthmann has = call the CDC
rt @JewishTweets menorah contest http://twitter.com/JewishTweets/status/1049820884 pics of our office lights?
i have one of those gel dispensing bottles you can have. otherwise i'll take it!
provides a good overview of why saving journalism should be a top priority http://tinyurl.com/6bcvyq
shouldn't have a problem with followers now! Congrats on NYT story - http://tinyurl.com/5rdc5y
yeah, i'm not really on the couch. the dining room table is actually closer to the truth. but i have slippers on.
perhaps a plan B is in order? just sent you a *timely* blog post for your consideration (to your gmail account)
- helmets are a good thing. so are passionate fans. :-)
- i demand a blackberry app!!
- very nice. i'm sending that to my mom, my BFF...and maybe my exBF.
never been so excited staring at the computer - live race feed is awesome! http://tinyurl.com/5u4xug hooray for @roaringmouse teammate!
cheering for my @roaringmouse teammate over live feed for CX Nats race - http://tinyurl.com/5u4xug she's in 2nd place!!
uh, overkill? The Ultimate Social Media Etiquette Handbook - http://tinyurl.com/5tuf4s
client @Visible_Tech gets great call out from MSFT adCenter analytics blog: http://tinyurl.com/6qobxc
chatting with VideoEgg and Jupitermedia about VideoEgg's new mobile ad offering
Great SF Chronicle article about the charity I rode 100 miles for in October (BORP) :: http://tinyurl.com/5dag5u
bummed can't make #svtweetup tomorrow but we have our holiday party at yacht club in the marina!
Bay Area peeps, support NorCal MTB team. Go see this in Oakland tonite: http://www.norcalmtb.org/events/bobby/index.htm
up and at 'em earlier than normal this morning; things to do, people to see.
Listening to SF's emergency siren test. Goes off every Tuesday at 12pm noon, like clockwork.
Andrew Frank really needs to talk to VideoEgg about CPE. Launched 2/08. http://tinyurl.com/596kz5
brainstorming ideas arond Complex Event Processing and Business Process Management. Bueller? Bueller?
from one political dynasty to the next - http://tinyurl.com/5fg3cc - whatever happened to rising up through hard work & determination?
just finished matzah ball soup, like any good Jewish girl who has a cold
home nursing a cold. following up w/ media for VideoEgg meetings in New York from the comfort of my couch, with fuzzy socks on.
winter finally comes to SF. rain, who knew? Riding for 5 hours today anyway- likely Stinson or Mt Tam. First, coffee.
Out of office is ON, Jan 5th to-do list made so I can clear my head of work for 11 whole days. I bet Twitter traffic dies down. VACAY 4 me!
also combing through Twitter wiki - http://twitteringjournalists.pbwiki.com/
cleaning out inbox led to following relevant BizWeek journalist Twitters - http://tinyurl.com/5637ce
Worked with @mediaphyter to contribute ZDNET guest column for @visible_tech on social media and BI. Closing out year with coverage!
Worried about being at home alone w/o housemates for next 5 days... w/ more leftover bday cake & holiday deserts than I know what to do with
sorting through the ridiculous amt of "year in review" and "2009 prediction" stories
Twitter world seems to have moved on from @TechCrunch's rant yesterday about embargos. A balanced response - http://tinyurl.com/3rclam
gifts for the beer lover - http://tinyurl.com/56b63x - @bfuller9, you should give the list to your family
